subSections.title: Descendants
subSections.text:
* [[き]] ''({{w|Hiragana}} character derived from {{w|Man'yōgana}})'' <!-- Listed in 上代特殊仮名遣 Jōdai Tokushu Kanazukai -->
* [[キ]] ''({{w|Katakana}} character derived from {{w|Man'yōgana}})'' <!-- Listed in 上代特殊仮名遣 Jōdai Tokushu Kanazukai -->

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
Note that in Japanese, both {{l|ja|机}} and {{l|ja|機}} are used with separate meanings (<big>机</big>: ''[[desk]]'' and <big>機</big>: ''[[machine]]; [[airplane]]; [[chance]]'') while in simplified Chinese, {{l|zh|机}} is the simplified form of <big>機</big>.

[[Category:Han characters from which hiragana were derived|き]]
[[Category:Han characters from which katakana were derived|キ]]
[[Category:CJKV simplified characters which already existed as traditional characters|木幾]]
